sentence: For instance, Democratic House candidate Shrina Kurani and Republican Senate candidate Blake Masters have both offered NFTs as "incentives for donors," albeit "to varying degrees of success," Bloomberg reports (these are, after all, still "the early days of crypto's push into politics").
author: Brigid Kennedy
title: Congressional candidates turn to NFTs as form of campaign finance

sentence: Author and Arizona Senate candidate Blake Masters said the book Newsom appeared to be reading in the photo was a "terrible novel."
author: Hanna Panreck
title: Gavin Newsom roasted for picture of him reading 'banned books' he says states are 'afraid of'

sentence: The crowded primary still includes Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich, retired Maj. Gen. Mick McGuire, former Arizona National Guard adjutant general, and venture capitalist Blake Masters.
author: D. Hunter Schwarz
title: These 8 midterm races in the West could decide who controls Congress
